title: US court rules many of Trump's global tariffs are illegal
description: The tariffs can remain in place until mid-October to allow the Trump administration time to request the Supreme Court take up the case.
content:
US court rules many of Trump's global tariffs are illegal
The ruling will not take effect until 14 October to give the administration time to ask the Supreme Court to take up the case.
In a 7-4 decision, the US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circui... [5005 chars]

title: US court rules Trump's global tariffs are illegal - but leaves them in place for now
description: The US Court of Appeals ruled that the US president was not legally allowed to declare national emergencies and impose import taxes on almost every country, as it mostly upheld a decision by a specialised federal trade court.
content:
Donald Trump's tariffs are unconstitutional, but they can remain in place for now, the US Court of Appeals has said.
The court ruled that the US president was not legally allowed to declare national emergencies and impose import taxes on almost every... [2579 chars]

title: US blocks Palestinian leader Mahmoud Abbas from attending UN meeting in New York
description: The decision comes as France leads international efforts to recognise a Palestinian state at the UN meeting next month.
content:

title: ‘Just hysteria’: UK faces a crisis but the IMF bailout talk is overblown
description: Despite sluggish growth and rising borrowing costs, most economists agree that Rachel Reeves doesn’t face a repeat of 1976
content:
International confidence in the UK government’s economic policies had evaporated. Growth was stalling, inflation was galloping, and Labour – back in power after a reckless Conservative administration had gambled on tax cuts – was in deep trouble.
